backend/main.mo: Main actor defining profile, assessment, logging, intervention, safety, analytics, and sleep-related types plus access control and Stripe config with storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module containing legacy versions of profile- and health-related types to support upgrading stored data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like summary listing concise descriptions of major frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry loading the React app with optional AdSense script injection.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify-style redirect routing all paths to index.html for SPA behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring identity login, profile loading, dashboard routing, and profile setup modal gating.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSenseBanne: AdSense banner component that initializes ads or shows a placeholder when not configured.
frontend/src/components/AIAssistantTab.t: Premium AI assistant chat UI with message history, gating for non‑premium users, and mock AI responses.
Renders family health management UI with mock members and emergency contacts plus dialogs to add them using toasts.
frontend/src/components/FitnessTab.tsx: Displays fitness metrics, recent workouts, and an activity logging dialog with mock data and premium gating.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, theme toggle, and logout integration via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/HealthVaultTab.t: Shows medical document storage UI with mock documents and premium-gated upload functionality.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login landing screen with branding, feature highlights, and Internet Identity login flow.
frontend/src/components/MembershipTab.ts: Membership upgrade UI with Stripe checkout integration, feature comparison, and premium gating.
frontend/src/components/mental/AcuteMode: Renders acute intervention tools including breathing timer and predefined protocols for stress situations.
frontend/src/components/mental/analytics: Computes weekly aggregate metrics from daily logs and provides simple correlation interpretation.
frontend/src/components/mental/assessmen: Defines assessment structures and question sets for PHQ‑9, GAD‑7, and related mental‑health questionnaires.
Calculates assessment results by scoring multiple questionnaires and deriving summary metrics and profiles.
frontend/src/components/mental/Assessmen: Provides multi-assessment flow with saving, progress tracking, and result computation using local draft storage.
frontend/src/components/mental/breathing: Hook managing timed breathing cycles with phase transitions and start/stop control.
frontend/src/components/mental/cbt/compu: Generates CBT progress metrics using recent journals and logs to track distortions, belief shifts, and avoidance.
frontend/src/components/mental/cbt/modul: Exports lists of CBT modules and distortion education items for UI display and learning.
frontend/src/components/mental/CbtWorksp: Displays CBT progress metrics and module previews using user interventions, journals, and logs.
frontend/src/components/mental/condition: Dialog component that lets users search for mental health conditions, generates guidance, checks consent and risk, and displays crisis resources if needed.
Defines mental health condition metadata and matching logic for mapping user input to known conditions.
Generates structured guidance for conditions with optional deterministic personalization based on user profile.
Implements deterministic risk assessment from conditions and keywords and detects when immediate crisis intervention is needed.
frontend/src/components/mental/ConsentGa: Blocks access to mental health features until user consent is confirmed, showing a loading state as needed.
frontend/src/components/mental/ConsentSc: Shows consent, privacy, and disclaimer information and allows users to accept and save consent status.
frontend/src/components/mental/crisis/ho: Provides crisis hotline data per country for emergency support routing.
frontend/src/components/mental/DailyTrac: Handles creation and display of daily mood and behavior logs with sliders, tags, and on-chain saving.
Utility functions for formatting dates and calculating daily and weekly ranges based on timezone.
frontend/src/components/mental/JournalCb: UI component for creating, analyzing, reframing, and saving CBT-style journal entries with optional safety checks.
frontend/src/components/mental/journalin: Analyzes journal text to detect cognitive distortions, emotional intensity, and generates Socratic prompts.
Generates simple cognitive reframe text based on evidence for and against a thought.
frontend/src/components/mental/pathway/M: UI card displaying mental health disclaimers and crisis support information.
frontend/src/components/mental/pathway/m: Defines specialized high-performance therapy modules with their step structures and prompts.
Provides base module definitions and shared interfaces for steps and modules across the therapy system.
Serializes and deserializes module progress, handling anonymous redaction and mapping saved artifacts to runner state.
Controls step-by-step module flow, managing user answers and navigation for various input types. Emits state changes and completion events.
Loads a module’s definition and saved progress, runs the module through TherapyModuleRunner, and saves progress or completion. Handles restart, loading states, and completion UI.
frontend/src/components/mental/pathway/t: Defines types and data structures for therapy layers, tools, and modules used in a multi-layer mental health pathway.
frontend/src/components/mental/pathway/T: Renders the main therapy pathway view, showing layers, module progress, and navigation into individual modules. Handles module selection, progress display, and condition-guidance modal.
frontend/src/components/mental/sleep-est: Implements deterministic sleep pattern analysis, computing daily metrics, aggregates, risk indicators, and optional advanced metrics from behavioral data.
Builds ML-friendly export data by deriving feature vectors from daily sleep inputs and packaging them with metadata and computed outputs.
Parses structured text input into validated sleep analysis data, handling formatting errors and enforcing day count limits.
Displays a list of saved sleep analysis runs and allows viewing detailed reports for each run.
Handles input, parsing, analysis, and navigation for the sleep estimator tool, including running analyses and viewing history or blueprint.
Renders the sleep analysis results with options to save the run, export ML data, and return to input.
Provides a static blueprint explaining the data requirements and heuristic logic behind the sleep inference system.
Converts frontend sleep inputs and analysis results into backend-compatible SleepEstimatorRun structures with computed metrics and risk indicators.
Generates deterministic sleep optimization suggestions based on risk indicators and stability metrics, capped at five results.
Provides utility functions for parsing, validating, and manipulating times and timezones for sleep analysis.
Defines TypeScript types for sleep inputs, analysis outputs, daily analyses, and ML export structures.
frontend/src/components/mental/tracking/: Exports a list of predefined emotion tags and a helper to merge custom tags without duplicates.
frontend/src/components/mental/WeeklyAna: Displays weekly mental‑health analytics, loading states, and summary cards based on user logs.
Renders the mental health dashboard with consent gating, condition guidance modal, and cards for mood tracking, sleep, meditation, and other tools.
frontend/src/components/NutritionTab.tsx: Shows nutrition tracking including goals, meal logs, and a dialog for logging food with mock data and premium gating.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingTab.ts: Implements an AI-style chat flow to gather user health info and generate a simulated baseline health score.
frontend/src/components/OverviewTab.tsx: Displays a user’s daily health overview with mock metrics like health score, vitals, streaks, and membership status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a modal for creating a user profile with validation, goal management, and saving via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileTab.tsx: User profile editor that loads, validates, updates, and saves caller profile data including demographics and life goals.
frontend/src/components/RemindersTab.tsx: UI for listing, toggling, and adding reminders with membership upsell and cooldown‑based dismissal.
frontend/src/components/RiskDetectionTab: Displays static risk‑assessment UI with premium gating and example risk categories and scores.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin modal for configuring Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries to the backend.
frontend/src/components/VitalsTab.tsx: Vital‑tracking UI showing mock charts and metrics with a dialog for logging new vitals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
Tracks UI dismissals with a localStorage-based cooldown timer and exposes a dismiss action.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, assessments, logs, and analytics.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeZone.ts: Detects and returns the user's timezone with a fallback to UTC.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a health-themed light/dark color system using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements a tabbed dashboard UI with navigation handlers for health, fitness, mental, and settings sections.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Displays a payment cancellation message with options to retry or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a success message after payment and auto-redirects to the dashboard after a short delay.
frontend/src/types/adsense.d.ts: Adds global typing for the adsbygoogle array on the Window object.
frontend/src/utils/personalization.ts: Provides validation and parsing utilities for personalization fields and converters between form values and backend gender/profession types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, constraints, and roadmap details for an AI-driven mental health platform.
